net.canarymod.chat

Class TextFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.chat.Colors
      • net.canarymod.chat.TextFormat
  • Deprecated. 
    use ChatFormat instead.

    @Deprecated
public class TextFormat
extends Colors
    This class contains James' color list and additionally formatting options for underlining, bolding, striking text etc etc
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter), Jason (darkdiplomat), James
